reporter_caption.center: DALLAS v. STATE FARM INS. CO., 823 So.2d 271 (Fla.App. 4 Dist. 2002)

caption.center: HENRY DALLAS, Appellant, v. STATE FARM INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for the Seventeenth Judicial Circuit, BrowardPage 272 County; J. Leonard Fleet, Judge; L.T. Case No. 01-3074 CACE08.
opinion.attorneys:
Larry Moskowitz of Larry Moskowitz, P.A., Fort Lauderdale, for appellant.
Frances F. Guasch of Luis E. Ordonez Associates, Miami, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed. See Coleman v. Fla. Ins. Guar. Ass'n, 517 So.2d 686 (Fla. 1988).
WARNER, GROSS and HAZOURI, JJ., concur.
